title: It's Time To Stop Looking For A New Family
alternative_title: 이제 그만 새가족을 찾으려합니다 ; It's Time to Stop Looking for a New Family ; It's Time to Stop Looking for a New Family ; 到此为止，去找新家吧
status: 이제 그만 새가족을 찾으려합니다 ; It's Time to Stop Looking for a New Family ; It's Time to Stop Looking for a New Family ; 到此为止，去找新家吧
description:
Description :
        Leticia, who has been used as the successor in cold treatment because she is the duke's illegitimate daughter. Her devotion is ruined by Sujin, the adoptive daughter from another world, and she died due to misrepresentation. At the end of it, she opens her eyes again at the age of sixteen. In this life, I will make a path for me to go.
“I will leave the family.”
However, the more she tries to avoid her second life, the more she becomes entangled with dangerous but fascinating relationships.
"You shouldn't have saved me, I wish you wouldn't give me a glance."
“Please leave the owner of the Magic Tower as Jungin, and make me her husband.”
A cataclysmic second life. Can Leticia find her new family?
